title: How do I quickly identify the bullet items and processed items in the Notes?
answer:
You can add a bullet to the to-do event or processed event to separate it from other events 

 When creating a note, add the bullet mark to an item. When you go back to the Notes screen, you can see that a hyphen (-) is prefixed to the bullet item. 

 Touch a processed event note to access the editing screen. Select the bullet. When you go back to the Notes screen, you can see that a check mark (âˆš) is prefixed to the processed item.
